mapper.insert:
/*insPayAppData*/ INSERT CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP ( PAY_APP_TYPE, PJT_NM, PJT_SN, BUDGET_NM, BUDGET_SN, APP_DE, APP_TITLE, APP_CONT, BNK_SN, BNK_NM, ACC_NO, ACC_NM, PAY_APP_STAT, GUBUN, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{payAppType}, #{pjtNm}, #{pjtSn}, #{budgetNm}, #{budgetSn}, #{appDe}, #{appTitle}, #{appCont}, #{bnkSn}, #{bnkNm}, #{accNo}, #{accNm}, #{payAppStat}, 'W', #{regEmpSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_PAY_APP'

/*insExnpData*/ INSERT CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP ( PAY_APP_SN, PAY_APP_TYPE, PJT_NM, PJT_SN, EXNP_DE, EXNP_EMP_SEQ, G20_EMP_CD, G20_DEPT_CD, EXNP_BRIEFS, ADD_EXNP_BRIEFS, BUSN_CD, BNK_SN, BNK_NM, ACC_NO, ACC_NM, GUBUN, REG_EMP_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{payAppSn}, #{payAppType}, #{pjtNm}, #{pjtSn}, #{exnpDe}, #{exnpEmpSeq}, #{g20EmpCd}, #{g20DeptCd}, #{exnpBriefs}, #{addExnpBriefs}, #{busnCd}, #{bnkSn}, #{bnkNm}, #{accNo}, #{accNm}, 'W', #{regEmpSeq} )
SELECT AUTO_INCREMENT FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = 'CAM_MNG' AND TABLE_NAME = 'DJ_EXNP'
mapper.update: /*updPayAppData*/ UPDATE CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP SET PAY_APP_TYPE = #{payAppType}, PJT_NM = #{pjtNm}, PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}, APP_DE = #{appDe}, APP_TITLE = #{appTitle}, APP_CONT = #{appCont}, BNK_SN = #{bnkSn}, BNK_NM = #{bnkNm}, ACC_NO = #{accNo}, ACC_NM = #{accNm}, PAY_APP_STAT = #{payAppStat}, MOD_DT = NOW(), MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq} WHERE PAY_APP_SN = #{payAppSn}

/*updExnpData*/ UPDATE CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP SET PAY_APP_SN = #{payAppSn}, PAY_APP_TYPE = #{payAppType}, PJT_NM = #{pjtNm}, PJT_SN = #{pjtSn}, EXNP_DE = #{exnpDe}, EXNP_EMP_SEQ = #{exnpEmpSeq}, G20_EMP_CD = #{g20EmpCd}, G20_DEPT_CD = #{g20DeptCd}, EXNP_BRIEFS = #{exnpBriefs}, ADD_EXNP_BRIEFS = #{addExnpBriefs}, BUSN_CD = #{busnCd}, BNK_SN = #{bnkSn}, BNK_NM = #{bnkNm}, ACC_NO = #{accNo}, ACC_NM = #{accNm}, MOD_DT = NOW(), MOD_EMP_SEQ = #{regEmpSeq} WHERE EXNP_SN = #{exnpSn}
mapper.select: /*getPayAppReqData*/ SELECT A.*, B.DOC_NO FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP A LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO B ON A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID WHERE PAY_APP_SN = #{payAppSn}
/*getPayAppFinalData*/ SELECT A.*, B.DOC_NO FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP A LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO B ON A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID WHERE A.PAY_APP_SN = #{payAppSn} AND A.DOC_STATUS = 100
mapper.insert: /*insPayAppDetailData*/ INSERT CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET ( PAY_APP_SN, BUDGET_NM, BUDGET_SN, EVID_TYPE, TR_CD, CRM_NM, CRM_BNK_NM, CRM_ACC_NO, CRM_ACC_HOLDER, TR_DE, TOT_COST, SUP_COST, VAT_COST, CARD, CARD_NO, ETC, ISS, ADVANCES ) VALUES ( #{payAppSn}, #{budgetNm}, #{budgetSn}, #{evidType}, #{trCd}, #{crmNm}, #{crmBnkNm}, #{crmAccNo}, #{crmAccHolder}, #{trDe}, #{totCost}, #{supCost}, #{vatCost}, #{card}, #{cardNo}, #{etc}, #{iss}, #{advances} )

/*insExnpDetailData*/ INSERT CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP_DET ( EXNP_SN, BUDGET_SN, BUDGET_NM, EVID_TYPE, TR_CD, CRM_NM, CRM_BNK_NM, CRM_ACC_NO, CRM_ACC_HOLDER, TR_DE, TOT_COST, SUP_COST, VAT_COST, CARD, CARD_NO, ETC, ISS, FILE1, FILE2, FILE3, FILE4, FILE5, FILE6, FILE7, FILE8, FILE9, FILE10 ) VALUES ( #{exnpSn}, #{budgetSn}, #{budgetNm}, #{evidType}, #{trCd}, #{crmNm}, #{crmBnkNm}, #{crmAccNo}, #{crmAccHolder}, #{trDe}, #{totCost}, #{supCost}, #{vatCost}, #{card}, #{cardNo}, #{etc}, #{iss}, (SELECT FILE1 FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET WHERE PAY_APP_DET_SN = #{payDestSn}), (SELECT FILE2 FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET WHERE PAY_APP_DET_SN = #{payDestSn}), (SELECT FILE3 FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET WHERE PAY_APP_DET_SN = #{payDestSn}), (SELECT FILE4 FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET WHERE PAY_APP_DET_SN = #{payDestSn}), (SELECT FILE5 FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET WHERE PAY_APP_DET_SN = #{payDestSn}), (SELECT FILE6 FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET WHERE PAY_APP_DET_SN = #{payDestSn}), (SELECT FILE7 FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET WHERE PAY_APP_DET_SN = #{payDestSn}), (SELECT FILE8 FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET WHERE PAY_APP_DET_SN = #{payDestSn}), (SELECT FILE9 FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET WHERE PAY_APP_DET_SN = #{payDestSn}), (SELECT FILE10 FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET WHERE PAY_APP_DET_SN = #{payDestSn}) )
mapper.select:
/*getPaymentList*/ SELECT A.*, B.DOC_NO, (SELECT SUM(TOT_COST) FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET WHERE PAY_APP_SN = A.PAY_APP_SN AND DET_STAT != "N") AS TOT_COST FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP A LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO B ON A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID WHERE 1=1
AND A.DOC_STATUS = #{docStatus}

/*getExnpData*/ SELECT A.*, B.EMP_SEQ, B.ERP_EMP_SEQ, B.EMP_NAME_KR, B.DEPT_SEQ, B.DEPT_NAME, C.DOC_NO FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP A LEFT JOIN CAM_HR.DJ_EMP_INFO B ON A.EXNP_EMP_SEQ = B.EMP_SEQ LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO C ON A.DOC_ID = C.DOC_ID WHERE EXNP_SN = #{exnpSn}
/*getExnpDetailData*/ SELECT A.* FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP_DET A WHERE EXNP_SN = #{exnpSn}

/*getExnpG20List*/ SELECT 1212 AS CO_CD, A.EXNP_DET_SN, A.EXNP_SN, A.EVID_TYPE, A.TR_CD, A.BUDGET_SN AS BGT_CD, REPLACE(A.TR_DE, "-", "") AS IN_DT, REPLACE(A.TR_DE, "-", "") AS TAX_DT, REPLACE(D.APP_DE, "-", "") AS REG_DT, REPLACE(D.PAY_EXNP_DE, "-", "") AS EXEC_DT, DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y%m%d') AS TXT_DONE_DT, "" AS RPMR_NO, A.TR_DE AS CNT_DT, "" AS DUMMY1, "" AS DUMMY2, "" AS DUMMY3, B.BUSN_CD AS DIV_CD, B.BUSN_CD AS DIV_CD2, B.G20_DEPT_CD AS DEPT_CD, B.G20_EMP_CD AS EMP_CD, C.PJT_CD AS MGT_CD, "" AS BOTTOM_CD, CASE WHEN D.PAY_APP_TYPE = '1' THEN '1' WHEN D.PAY_APP_TYPE = '2' THEN '6' WHEN D.PAY_APP_TYPE = '3' THEN '7' ELSE '55' END AS DOCU_FG, B.EXNP_BRIEFS AS RMK_DC, B.ACC_NM AS BANK_NM1, B.ACC_NO AS BA_NB1, A.EVID_TYPE, A.ETC, A.SUP_COST AS SUP_AM, A.VAT_COST AS VAT_AM, A.CRM_NM AS TR_NM, A.CRM_BNK_NM AS BANK_NM2, A.CRM_ACC_NO AS BA_NB2, A.CRM_ACC_HOLDER AS DEPOSITOR, A.CARD AS CTR_NM, A.CARD_NO AS CTR_NB, "" AS ETCDATA_CD, "" AS ETCPER_CD, "" AS ETCREG_NO, "" AS ETCPER_NM, "" AS ETCZIP_CD, "" AS ETCADDR, "" AS ETCPHONE, "" AS ETCBANK_CD, "" AS ETCACCT_NO, "" AS ETCACCT_NM, "" AS ETCRVRS_YM, "" AS ETCDIV_CD, "" AS ETCDUMMY1 FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP_DET A LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP B ON A.EXNP_SN = B.EXNP_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_PJT_MNG.DJ_PROJECT C ON B.PJT_SN = C.PJT_SN LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP D ON B.PAY_APP_SN = D.PAY_APP_SN WHERE A.EXNP_SN = #{exnpSn}
AND A.EVID_TYPE in (${evidTypeArr})
/*getCountDoc*/ SELECT IFNULL(MAX(EXNP_CNT), 0) FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP_DET WHERE TR_DE = #{CNT_DT} AND EXNP_STAT = "Y"
/*getExnpCountDoc*/ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP_DET WHERE TR_DE = #{CNT_DT} AND EXNP_STAT = "Y" AND EXNP_SN = #{EXNP_SN}

/*getExnpList*/ SELECT A.*, B.DOC_NO, (SELECT SUM(TOT_COST) FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP_DET WHERE EXNP_SN = A.EXNP_SN) AS TOT_COST FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP A LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO B ON A.DOC_ID = B.DOC_ID

/*getExnpReList*/ SELECT E.*, DI.APPRO_KEY AS APPRO_KEY, DI.DOC_MENU_CD AS DOC_MENU_CD FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP_DET ED LEFT JOIN CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP E ON ED.EXNP_SN = E.EXNP_SN LEFT JOIN DJ_CAMTIC.A_DOC_INFO DI ON E.DOC_ID = DI.DOC_ID WHERE E.DOC_STATUS = '100' AND ED.EVID_TYPE IN (1, 2, 3) GROUP BY E.EXNP_SN
mapper.update: /*updPayAppDetailStatus*/ UPDATE CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET SET EXNP_STAT = "Y" WHERE PAY_APP_SN = #{item}
/*resolutionExnpStatus*/ UPDATE CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP SET RE_STAT = "Y" WHERE EXNP_SN = #{exnpSn}
mapper.select:
/* getPayAttInfo */ SELECT FI.FILE_NO AS FILE1_NO, CONCAT(FI.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI.FILE_EXT) AS FILE1_NAME, CONCAT(FI.FILE_PATH, FI.FILE_UUID) AS FILE1_PATH,
FI2.FILE_NO AS FILE2_NO, CONCAT(FI2.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI2.FILE_EXT) AS FILE2_NAME, CONCAT(FI2.FILE_PATH, FI2.FILE_UUID) AS FILE2_PATH,
FI3.FILE_NO AS FILE3_NO, CONCAT(FI3.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI3.FILE_EXT) AS FILE3_NAME, CONCAT(FI3.FILE_PATH, FI3.FILE_UUID) AS FILE3_PATH,
FI4.FILE_NO AS FILE4_NO, CONCAT(FI4.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI4.FILE_EXT) AS FILE4_NAME, CONCAT(FI4.FILE_PATH, FI4.FILE_UUID) AS FILE4_PATH,
FI5.FILE_NO AS FILE5_NO, CONCAT(FI5.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI5.FILE_EXT) AS FILE5_NAME, CONCAT(FI5.FILE_PATH, FI5.FILE_UUID) AS FILE5_PATH,
FI6.FILE_NO AS FILE6_NO, CONCAT(FI6.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI6.FILE_EXT) AS FILE6_NAME, CONCAT(FI6.FILE_PATH, FI6.FILE_UUID) AS FILE6_PATH,
FI7.FILE_NO AS FILE7_NO, CONCAT(FI7.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI7.FILE_EXT) AS FILE7_NAME, CONCAT(FI7.FILE_PATH, FI7.FILE_UUID) AS FILE7_PATH,
FI8.FILE_NO AS FILE8_NO, CONCAT(FI8.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI8.FILE_EXT) AS FILE8_NAME, CONCAT(FI8.FILE_PATH, FI8.FILE_UUID) AS FILE8_PATH,
FI9.FILE_NO AS FILE9_NO, CONCAT(FI9.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI9.FILE_EXT) AS FILE9_NAME, CONCAT(FI9.FILE_PATH, FI9.FILE_UUID) AS FILE9_PATH,
FI10.FILE_NO AS FILE10_NO, CONCAT(FI10.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI10.FILE_EXT) AS FILE10_NAME, CONCAT(FI10.FILE_PATH, FI10.FILE_UUID) AS FILE10_PATH FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_PAY_APP_DET PA LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI ON PA.FILE1 = FI.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI2 ON PA.FILE2 = FI2.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI3 ON PA.FILE3 = FI3.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI4 ON PA.FILE4 = FI4.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI5 ON PA.FILE4 = FI5.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI6 ON PA.FILE6 = FI6.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI7 ON PA.FILE6 = FI7.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI8 ON PA.FILE6 = FI8.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI9 ON PA.FILE6 = FI9.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI10 ON PA.FILE6 = FI10.FILE_NO WHERE PAY_APP_DET_SN = #{payDestSn}
/* getPayAttEtcInfo */ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId} ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC

/* getExnpAttInfo */ SELECT FI.FILE_NO AS FILE1_NO, CONCAT(FI.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI.FILE_EXT) AS FILE1_NAME, CONCAT(FI.FILE_PATH, FI.FILE_UUID) AS FILE1_PATH,
FI2.FILE_NO AS FILE2_NO, CONCAT(FI2.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI2.FILE_EXT) AS FILE2_NAME, CONCAT(FI2.FILE_PATH, FI2.FILE_UUID) AS FILE2_PATH,
FI3.FILE_NO AS FILE3_NO, CONCAT(FI3.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI3.FILE_EXT) AS FILE3_NAME, CONCAT(FI3.FILE_PATH, FI3.FILE_UUID) AS FILE3_PATH,
FI4.FILE_NO AS FILE4_NO, CONCAT(FI4.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI4.FILE_EXT) AS FILE4_NAME, CONCAT(FI4.FILE_PATH, FI4.FILE_UUID) AS FILE4_PATH,
FI5.FILE_NO AS FILE5_NO, CONCAT(FI5.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI5.FILE_EXT) AS FILE5_NAME, CONCAT(FI5.FILE_PATH, FI5.FILE_UUID) AS FILE5_PATH,
FI6.FILE_NO AS FILE6_NO, CONCAT(FI6.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI6.FILE_EXT) AS FILE6_NAME, CONCAT(FI6.FILE_PATH, FI6.FILE_UUID) AS FILE6_PATH,
FI7.FILE_NO AS FILE7_NO, CONCAT(FI7.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI7.FILE_EXT) AS FILE7_NAME, CONCAT(FI7.FILE_PATH, FI7.FILE_UUID) AS FILE7_PATH,
FI8.FILE_NO AS FILE8_NO, CONCAT(FI8.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI8.FILE_EXT) AS FILE8_NAME, CONCAT(FI8.FILE_PATH, FI8.FILE_UUID) AS FILE8_PATH,
FI9.FILE_NO AS FILE9_NO, CONCAT(FI9.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI9.FILE_EXT) AS FILE9_NAME, CONCAT(FI9.FILE_PATH, FI9.FILE_UUID) AS FILE9_PATH,
FI10.FILE_NO AS FILE10_NO, CONCAT(FI10.FILE_ORG_NAME, '.', FI10.FILE_EXT) AS FILE10_NAME, CONCAT(FI10.FILE_PATH, FI10.FILE_UUID) AS FILE10_PATH FROM CAM_MNG.DJ_EXNP_DET PA LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI ON PA.FILE1 = FI.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI2 ON PA.FILE2 = FI2.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI3 ON PA.FILE3 = FI3.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI4 ON PA.FILE4 = FI4.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI5 ON PA.FILE4 = FI5.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI6 ON PA.FILE6 = FI6.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI7 ON PA.FILE6 = FI7.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI8 ON PA.FILE6 = FI8.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI9 ON PA.FILE6 = FI9.FILE_NO LEFT JOIN CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO FI10 ON PA.FILE6 = FI10.FILE_NO WHERE EXNP_DET_SN = #{exnpDestSn}
/* getExnpAttEtcInfo */ SELECT * FROM CAM_COMMON.DJ_FILE_INFO WHERE CONTENT_ID = #{contentId} ORDER BY REG_DATE DESC
